ISSUE.TITLE: Adding negative reward points with the "Points validity" field filled causes exception
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.0 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to the Customer edit page 2. There, proceed to the Reward points panel 3. Fill in the Points filed with any negative value 4. Fill in the Points validity field with some value. Obviously this field should not be used when reducing points but it should not cause an exeption either.
